title: A Championship Season in Mariachi Country
description: Every year along the Texas border, high school teams battle it out in one of the nation’s most intense championship rivalries. But they’re not playing football.
dc:creator: Cecilia Ballí
media:credit: Benjamin Lowy for The New York Times
media:description: Melody Quiroz with fellow students from Rio Grande City High School’s Mariachi Cascabel, backstage at the Mariachi Vargas Extravaganza in San Antonio in December.
